abstract: Washington Capitals win hockey's seventh annual Winter Classic, beating Chicago Blackhawks, 3-2.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Capitals defeated the Chicago Blackhawks in the seventh edition of the Winter Classic on a goal by Troy Brouwer with 12.9 seconds remaining.
snippet: The Washington Capitals defeated the Chicago Blackhawks in the seventh edition of the Winter Classic on a goal by Troy Brouwer with 12.9 seconds remaining.

headline.main: Battling Sun’s Glare at Ballpark, the Capitals Deliver a Final Bit of Brilliance
headline.seo: Winter Classic 2015: Troy Brouwer’s Goal Lifts Capitals Over Blackhawks
headline.print_headline: Battling Sun’s Glare at Ballpark, the Capitals Deliver a Final Bit of Brilliance
